C G M O P S 

C

ClasspathExporter - Class in org.microbean.launcher
A special-purpose class that converts a list of Maven-style artifact coordinates into a Set of classpath URIs when it is added to a CDI container.
ClasspathExporter() - Constructor for class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
Creates a new ClasspathExporter.

G

getClasspath() - Method in class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
Returns an unmodifiable Set of URIs representing Java classpath elements that resulted from examining the user-supplied artifact path—a list of Maven-style artifact coordinates.
getDependencies() - Method in class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
Returns the List of Dependency instances that will be used by this class to compute the eventual classpath returned by the ClasspathExporter.getClasspath() method.
getRemainingCommandLineArguments() - Method in class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
Returns a String array representing any command line arguments that this class did not "consume" as it tried to determine the user-supplied artifact path.

M

Main - Class in org.microbean.launcher.main
A class whose main(String[]) method can be used to start a CDI application given a collection of Maven Central artifact coordinates.
main(String[]) - Static method in class org.microbean.launcher.main.Main
Calls the main(SeContainerInitializer, SeContainerInitializer, Consumer, String[]) method with null, null, null and the supplied commandLineArguments.
main(SeContainerInitializer, SeContainerInitializer, String[]) - Static method in class org.microbean.launcher.main.Main
Calls the main(SeContainerInitializer, SeContainerInitializer, Consumer, String[]) method with the supplied boostrapInitializer, the supplied initializer, null and the supplied commandLineArguments.
main(SeContainerInitializer, SeContainerInitializer, Consumer<? super SeContainer>, String[]) - Static method in class org.microbean.launcher.main.Main
Starts a CDI container with a classpath formed from the existing classpath and the local filesystem locations of Maven artifacts and their transitive dependencies resolvable from the value of the --artifactPath command line option (or its short form, -ap).

O

org.microbean.launcher - package org.microbean.launcher
Provides classes and interfaces that help to transform a list of Maven artifact coordinates into a valid set of Java classpath URIs.
org.microbean.launcher.main - package org.microbean.launcher.main
Provides classes and interfaces that can start a CDI application given a list of Maven-style artifact coordinates.

P

produceDependencies(CommandLine) - Method in class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
A producer method that produces an application-scoped List of Dependency instances that represent Maven-style artifact coordinates from either explicitly-set Dependency instances or command-line arguments or system properties.

S

setDependencies(List<Dependency>) - Method in class org.microbean.launcher.ClasspathExporter
Sets the List of Dependency instances that will be used by this ClasspathExporter to compute the classpath returned by the ClasspathExporter.getClasspath() method.
